alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 4:34AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...South Dakota... Iowa... Flandreau Creek near Flandreau affecting Moody and Pipestone Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flandreau Creek near Flandreau. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture land begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:45 AM CDT Sunday was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Flandreau Creek Flandreau 9.0 9.1 Sun 4 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 745 AM CDT.
